subject: Baseball
College World Series
NCAA Baseball Championships
lead_paragraph: Chris Taylor hit a two-run single with two outs in the bottom of the ninth inning, lifting host Virginia to a 3-2 victory against U.C. Irvine and back into the College World Series.
snippet: Chris Taylor hit a two-run single with two outs in the bottom of the ninth inning, lifting host Virginia to a 3-2 victory against U.C. Irvine and back into the College World Series.
